name: Dark Sage (Anime)
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand or Deck) by Tributing 1 "Dark Magician" immediately after applying the effect of "Time Wizard" in which you called the coin toss right. During either player's turn, while this card is face-up on the field: The controller may activate 1 Spell Card from their hand. During your Draw Phase, instead of conducting your normal draw: You can add 1 Spell Card from your Deck to your hand. This card must be face-up on the field to activate and to resolve this effect.
